----FLOPPY----
0 -> Bootloader
1 -> Kernel
2..7 -> Config
8..776 -> Files
----RAM----
0x00000 System
0x00500 Config:
	0x00500 App Opened
	0x00502 
0x00600 Pointers
0x01000 Kernel
0x10000 Video Buffer
0x1FE00 File Storage
0x80000 BIOS
0xA0000 VRAM
0xC0000 BIOS
b1 Code/Data
b2 Parent/N
b3 ShowTitle/N
b4 Type-1/Type-2
b5-8 Color Window
next B are name of file 2B x letters
File Types:
1-1.cxe ; Assembled Files
1-0; Readable&Writeable through Code
0-1.bin ; only edited with binary
0-0.txt ; only edited with text
----Works like----
0x01000 "AYO! User called app pointer 0x00600"
0x00600 "Alright, uhh let's see the data"
0x00500 "Yo, it's a .txt file? I'll run some code"
0x00600 "Uhm open notepad? alright!"
0x1FE00 "Open Myself? OK!"
----FREE SPACE----
0x01000 / 0x10000 Kernel
----FONT----
Fonts in 3B at 2B
Logo:
1. 03AC
2. 2A05
3. 08E9
4. 4988
5. 2497
6. 12E0
A: 010101111101101 ; 2BED
B: 110101110101110 ; 6BAE
C: 011101100101011 ; 3B2B
D: 110101101101110 ; 6B6E
E: 111100111100111 ; 79E7
F: 111100111100100 ; 79E4
G: 011100101101010 ; 396A
H: 101101111101101 ; 5BED
I: 111010010010111 ; 7497
J: 111001001101010 ; 726A
K: 101110100110101 ; 5D35
L: 100100100100111 ; 4927
M: 101111111101101 ; 5FED
N: 010101101101101 ; 2B6D
O: 111101101101111 ; 7B6F
P: 110101110100100 ; 6BA4
Q: 010101101011001 ; 2B59
R: 110101110101101 ; 6BAD
S: 011100010001110 ; 388E
T: 111010010010010 ; 7492
U: 101101101101111 ; 5B6F
V: 101101101101010 ; 5B6A
W: 101101111111101 ; 5BFD
X: 101101010101101 ; 5AAD
Y: 101101010010010 ; 5A92
Z: 111001010100111 ; 72A7
1: 010110010010111 ; 2C97
2: 110001010100111 ; 62A7
3: 110001110001110 ; 638E
4: 101101111001001 ; 5BC9
5: 111100110001110 ; 798E
6: 011100110101010 ; 39AE
7: 111001010100100 ; 72A4
8: 010101010101010 ; 2AAA
9: 010101011001110 ; 2ACE
0: 010101101101010 ; 2B6A
,: 000000000010010 ; 0012
.: 000000000000010 ; 0002
;: 010000000010010 ; 2012
|: 010010010010010 ; 2492
': 010010000000000 ; 2400
?: 110001010000010 ; 6282
!: 010010010000010 ; 2482
°: 010101010000000 ; 2A80
:: 000010000010000 ; 0410
-: 000000111000000 ; 01C0
+: 000010111010000 ; 05D0
*: 010111010000000 ; 2E80
%: 101001010100101 ; 52A5
~: 000101010000000 ; 0A80
[: 011100100100011 ; 3923
]: 110001001001110 ; 624E
_: 000000000000111 ; 0007
<: 000011100011000 ; 0718
>: 000110001110000 ; 0C70
#: 101111101111101 ; 5F7D
█: 111111111111111 ; 7FFF
▒: 101010101010101 ; 5555
▄: 000000111111111 ; 01FF
▀: 111111111000000 ; 7FC0
■: 000111111111000 ; 0FF8
·: 000000010000000 ; 0080
